data.actual_result: The time index is displayed in the wrong language if it's not on the  form. I've tested it with several languages
data.expected_result: The time index should display it in the usage you use on discord
data.short_description: The audit log time index doesn't fit your discord language
data.steps_to_repro: - Set the discord language of your choice  - Open the audit log  - See that the date isn't correct, 'today' becomes 'heute', 'yesterday' becomes 'gestern' and so on (It's German for me because that's what my phone language is)
